definition: reinsurance (contractual device spreading risk between insurers)

sentences.english: Inspired by a cross between a fusebox and a prison.
sentences.chinese: 那靈感是來自保險絲盒與監獄的雜交麼。

sentences.english: All participants must arrange their own personal accident insurance.
sentences.chinese: 參加者必需自行購買意外保險。

sentences.english: The deposit insurance fund fell into the red in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 存款保險資金在2009年進入紅色警戒區。

sentences.english: I also worked at an insurance company for my graduate field work.
sentences.chinese: 並且我在一家保險公司進行了我的畢業設計。

sentences.english: The insurance industry is one of the fastest developing industries in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 保險行業是全球經濟中發展最快的行業之一。

sentences.english: Are there any other policies covering the helper?
sentences.chinese: 家傭是否擁有其他保險？

sentences.english: Securely held by a lobster clasp closure, the pendant also comes with an extender chain.
sentences.chinese: 龍蝦搭扣平安保險方便，並配有加長配飾。

sentences.english: Comes mounted on Nomad 2 shelf, with pre-wired fuse.
sentences.chinese: 來自遊牧2貨架上，與前有線保險絲。

sentences.english: The State shall advocate that labourers practice individual insurance in form of saving account.
sentences.chinese: 國家提倡勞動者個人進行儲蓄性保險。

sentences.english: Chapter Two researches on the exertion of subrogation right of marine insurance.
sentences.chinese: 第二章探討海上保險代位求償權的行使。

sentences.english: If you have insurance under a student plan, it probably will end in mid-August.
sentences.chinese: 如果你買的是學生險，保險可能會在八月中旬到期。

sentences.english: The first part is the summary of correlative theories on DIS.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分是存款保險制度相關理論的概述。

sentences.english: Safety of the spectators will also be guaranteed thanks to a related comprehensive insurance bill.
sentences.chinese: 此外，相關的綜合責任保險也將覆蓋觀衆的安全問題。

sentences.english: Trinity General Insurance Company Limited reserves the final right of approval.
sentences.chinese: 三聯保險有限公司保留保單的最後批覈權。

sentences.english: He took to safe that removed the list.
sentences.chinese: 他帶着曉陽去保險櫃裏取出了名單。

definition: life insurance/abbr. for 人壽保險|人寿保险
